mapper.select: SELECT t_knowledge_point.KNOWLEDGE_POINT_ID as knowledgePointId, t_knowledge_point.POINT_TITLE as pointTitle, t_knowledge_point.PID as pid, t_knowledge_point.LEAF, t_knowledge_point.ICON, t_knowledge_point.CREATE_USER as createUser, t_knowledge_point.CREATE_DATE as createDate, t_knowledge_point.UPDATE_DATE as updateDate, t_knowledge_point.DESCRIPTION as description, t_knowledge_point.STATUS as status, t_knowledge_point.SORT as sort FROM t_knowledge_point WHERE t_knowledge_point.KNOWLEDGE_POINT_ID = #{knowledgePointId}
mapper.insert: insert into t_knowledge_point (KNOWLEDGE_POINT_ID,POINT_TITLE,PID,LEAF,ICON,CREATE_USER,CREATE_DATE,UPDATE_DATE,DESCRIPTION, STATUS, SORT) values (#{knowledgePointId},#{pointTitle},#{pid},#{leaf},#{icon},#{createUser},#{createDate},#{updateDate},#{description},#{status}, #{sort})
mapper.update: update t_knowledge_point set POINT_TITLE=#{pointTitle}, PID=#{pid}, LEAF=#{leaf}, ICON=#{icon}, CREATE_USER=#{createUser}, CREATE_DATE=#{createDate}, UPDATE_DATE=#{updateDate}, DESCRIPTION=#{description}, STATUS=#{status}, SORT=#{sort} where KNOWLEDGE_POINT_ID=#{knowledgePointId};
